concept.title: Key length and location
concept.shortdesc: This document describes the location and the length of text keys.

conbody.p: The length of descriptor and numeric keys is implicit in the type. For text keys, it must be explicitly defined; the length of text keys is set at construction time.
The location of a key within an array element is defined by the offset of the key from the beginning of the element. The _FOFF macro can be used to define the offset value.
